<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 18"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Final Shot](/Feats.aspx?ID=3208) <actions string="Three Actions" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Gunslinger" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=406" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Guns & Gears](/Sources.aspx?ID=98) pg. 119</row>

**Requirements**
You're wielding an unloaded firearm.

</column>

---

You jam a triple charge of black powder into your weapon to unleash a devastating but risky and inaccurate attack. Interact to reload, expending three doses of black powder in addition to your normal black powder or ammunition, then Strike with your firearm against a creature within the weapon's first range increment. If you roll a success, the attack is instead a critical success, but if you roll a failure, the weapon misfires. Regardless of your roll, after the attack you're [flat-footed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=16) until the start of your next turn and [stunned 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=36).
name: Final Shot
